content.en: Skin Permeability Algorithms: Scientists are using algorithms to improve our understanding of how substances are absorbed through the skin. They are exploring questions such as whether pseudo-steady state conditions can be used instead of infinite-dose dermal absorption, if the effects of hydrogen-bond can be included in skin permeability models, and the limitations of existing algorithms for predicting skin permeation. By using predictive algorithms, virtual screening algorithms, and machine learning techniques, researchers hope to develop more accurate models for predicting skin permeability and identifying potential chemical penetration enhancers.
content.da: Hudpermeabilitetsalgoritmer: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at forbedre vores forståelse af, hvordan stoffer absorberes gennem huden. De undersøger spørgsmål som, om pseudo-steady state forhold kan bruges i stedet for uendelig-dosis dermal absorption, om effekten af hydrogenbinding kan inkluderes i hudpermeabilitetsmodeller, og begrænsningerne ved eksisterende algoritmer til forudsigelse af hudpermeation. Ved at bruge forudsigende algoritmer, virtuelle screeningsalgoritmer og maskinlæringsteknikker håber forskerne at udvikle mere præcise modeller for forudsigelse af hudpermeabilitet og at identificere potentielle kemiske penetrationsforstærkere.
